content.description: Use boolean expression to abbreviate expression (2017 Spring, Quest, Question 4)

p.line: You realize you could replace the entire body of _BOLDS_Mystery_BOLDE_ with a single _BOLDS_report_BOLDE_ (as shown below). What could go in there so _BOLDS_Mystery_BOLDE_ functions the same for all values of Boolean inputs A and B?

content.hint: not (A and B) == (not A) or (not B); not (A or B) == (not A) and (not B). The correct answer would be equivalent to ((not A) and (not B)).
